item.title: The Devil In I
item.description: Undo these chains, my friend I’ll show you the rage I’ve hidden Perish the sacrament Swallow, but nothing’s forgiven You and I can’t decide Which of us was taken for granted Make amends, some of us Are destined to be outlived Step inside; see the Devil in I Too many times we’ve let it come to this Step inside; see the Devil in I You’ll realize I’m not your devil anymore Under the words of men Something is tempting the father Where is your will, my friend?
